videos.title: EQUIPMENT  CLOUD & FREYA  FINAL FANTASY in STANDARD
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering and FINAL FANTASY collide in this new set, available on MTG Arena June 10th. Boros Equipment is finally good thanks to these amazing new cards.

MC Vegas BO1 Event: https://mcvegas.mtgfestivals.com/en-us/magic-play/ticketed-play-schedule.html?search=covertgoblue

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/h2j2TgD28EWa1K-fb1cYMQ
